ITEM.TEXT: Create Object size for the Current DB type

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA dbms TYPE dbcon_dbms.
IF kind IS INITIAL. dbms = sy-dbsys(3). ELSE. dbms = kind. ENDIF.
CASE dbms. WHEN 'MSS'. " MS SQL Server WHEN 'ORA'. " Oracle CREATE OBJECT object TYPE ygpl_dba_oracle_engine. WHEN 'INF'. " Informix WHEN 'ADA'. " WHEN 'DB2'. " DB2 WHEN 'DB4'. " DB2 WHEN 'DB6'. ENDCASE. IF object IS NOT BOUND. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_dba_cx_no_engine EXPORTING db_kind = dbms. ENDIF.

ITEM.TEXT: Get Object size for the Current DB type

ITEM.SOURCE: ` IF NOT o_object_size_singleton IS BOUND. o_object_size_singleton = create_new_object_size( ). ENDIF. object = o_object_size_singleton.
